archimate:BusinessObject.name: Security Architecture Review Guide
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
The document is a guide for security architecture reviews in Tech Services. It explains the purpose, scope, and process of two levels of security architecture reviews: Level 1 and Level 2. Level 1 is a self-assessment that focuses on deliverables, while Level 2 is a joint assessment that goes into more detail and requires a meeting with the Enterprise Security Architecture Team.
The document also describes the point scoring system, the output format, and the questions for each level of review. The questions are based on five main topics: high-level design, threat analysis, risk analysis, control needs, and security principles. The document aims to provide common expectations and standards for security design and architecture maturity in Tech Services.
It's been provided to the community for review and transparency & includes details on how we score the reviews.
